org.smpp

Class ReceiverBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smpp.SmppObject
      • org.smpp.util.ProcessingThread
        • org.smpp.ReceiverBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OutbindReceiver, Receiver

    public abstract class ReceiverBase
extends ProcessingThread
    Abstract base class for classes which can receive PDUs from connection. The receiving of PDUs can be be performed on background within a separate thread using the ProcessingThread class.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.4 $
    Author:
    Logica Mobile Networks SMPP Open Source Team
    See Also:
    Receiver, OutbindReceiver, Connection, Transmitter, Session

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReceiverBase

        public ReceiverBase()

    • Method Detail

      • receiveAsync

        protected abstract void receiveAsync()
        Method repeatedly called from process method. It's expected that derived classes implement atomic receive of one PDU in this method using ReceiverBase's tryReceivePDUWithTimeout and receivePDUFromConnection methods.
        See Also:
        tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection,PDU,long), ProcessingThread.process(), ProcessingThread.run()

      • tryReceivePDU

        protected abstract PDU tryReceivePDU(Connection connection,
                                     PDU expectedPDU)
                              throws UnknownCommandIdException,
                                     TimeoutException,
                                     PDUException,
                                     IOException
        This method should try to receive one PDU from the connection. It is called in cycle from tryReceivePDUWithTimeout until timeout expires. The method should check if the actualy received PDU is equal to the expectedPDU.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection from which the PDU should be received
        expectedPDU - the command id and sequence id of the received PDU should be equal to those of expectedPDU
        Returns:
        the received PDU if any or null if none received
        Throws:
        IOException - exception during communication
        PDUException - incorrect format of PDU
        TimeoutException - rest of data not received for too long time
        UnknownCommandIdException - PDU with unknown id was received
        See Also:
        tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection,PDU,long), receiveAsync(), ProcessingThread.run(), PDU.equals(Object)

      • process

        public void process()
        This is an implementation of ProcessingThread's process method, which is method called in loop from the run method.
        This simply calls receiveAsync.
        Specified by:
        process in class ProcessingThread

      • tryReceivePDUWithTimeout

        protected final PDU tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection connection,
                                             PDU expectedPDU)
                                      throws UnknownCommandIdException,
                                             TimeoutException,
                                             PDUException,
                                             IOException
        Calls tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection,PDU,long) with timeout set by setReceiveTimeout.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection from which the PDU should be received
        expectedPDU - the command id and sequence id of the received PDU should be equal to those of expectedPDU
        Returns:
        the received PDU if any or null if none received
        Throws:
        IOException - exception during communication
        PDUException - incorrect format of PDU
        TimeoutException - rest of data not received for too long time
        UnknownCommandIdException - PDU with unknown id was received
        See Also:
        tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection,PDU,long)

      • tryReceivePDUWithTimeout

        protected final PDU tryReceivePDUWithTimeout(Connection connection,
                                             PDU expectedPDU,
                                             long timeout)
                                      throws UnknownCommandIdException,
                                             TimeoutException,
                                             PDUException,
                                             IOException
        For specified time tries to receive a PDU from given connection by calling method tryReceivePDU. The method tryReceivePDU must be implemented in the derived class.

        The timeout can be either value > 0, then it means for how many milliseconds will be repeatedly tried to receive a PDU. If the timeout is = 0 then there is only one attempt to receive a PDU. If the timeout is equal to Data.RECEIVE_BLOCKING, then the this method tries receive a PDU until it is received.

        Parameters:
        connection - the connection from which the PDU should be received
        expectedPDU - the command id and sequence id of the received PDU should be equal to those of expectedPDU
        timeout - the timeout indication
        Returns:
        the received PDU if any or null if none received
        Throws:
        IOException - exception during communication
        PDUException - incorrect format of PDU
        TimeoutException - rest of data not received for too long time
        UnknownCommandIdException - PDU with unknown id was received
        See Also:
        tryReceivePDU(Connection,PDU), PDU.equals(Object)

      • receivePDUFromConnection

        protected final PDU receivePDUFromConnection(Connection connection,
                                             Unprocessed unprocessed)
                                      throws UnknownCommandIdException,
                                             TimeoutException,
                                             PDUException,
                                             IOException
        Elementary method receiving data from connection, trying to create PDU from them and buffering data in case the PDU isn't still complete. It has timeout checking for incomplete messages: if the message isn't received completly for certain time and no new data are received for this time, then exception is thrown as this could indicate communication problem.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to receive the data from
        Returns:
        either PDU, if complete received or null
        Throws:
        IOException - exception during communication
        PDUException - incorrect format of PDU
        TimeoutException - rest of data not received for too long time
        UnknownCommandIdException - PDU with unknown id was received
        See Also:
        Connection, Unprocessed

      • setReceiveTimeout

        public void setReceiveTimeout(long timeout)
        Sets the timeout for receiving the complete message. If no data are received for time longer then this timeout and there is still not completly received PDU in the internal buffer, TimeoutException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the new timeout value
        See Also:
        receivePDUFromConnection(Connection,Unprocessed), TimeoutException

      • getReceiveTimeout

        public long getReceiveTimeout()
        Returns the current setting of the receiving timeout.
        Returns:
        the current timeout value
